actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

official_title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the Federal Communications Commission from waiving the collection of penalties for violations of the alternative operator services requirements of such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the Federal Communications Commission from waiving penalties against aggregators (persons who make telephones available for interstate calls) or providers of operator services for violations of requirements unless such violations did not result in harm to consumers.

titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the Federal Communications Commission from waiving the collection of penalties for violations of the alternative operator services requirements of such Act.
